DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this one-day study will be to evaluate the clinical performance of SofLens Daily Disposable lenses compared to that of a marketed 1 Day Contact Lens.
DOC.brief_title: One-Day Dispensing Clinical Evaluation of SofLens Daily Disposable Lenses Compared to a Marketed 1 Day Contact Lens
DOC.criteria: Have physiologically normal anterior segments not exhibiting clinically significant biomicroscopy findings. Have no active ocular disease or allergic conjunctivitis. Not be using any topical ocular medications. Participating in a conflicting study. Considered by the Investigator to not be a suitable candidate for participation.
